class.name: ImporterMesh
class.brief_description: A [Resource] that contains vertex array-based geometry during the import process.
class.description:
ImporterMesh is a type of [Resource] analogous to [ArrayMesh]. It contains vertex array-based geometry, divided in [i]surfaces[/i]. Each surface contains a completely separate array and a material used to draw it. Design wise, a mesh with multiple surfaces is preferred to a single surface, because objects created in 3D editing software commonly contain multiple materials.
Unlike its runtime counterpart, [ImporterMesh] contains mesh data before various import steps, such as lod and shadow mesh generation, have taken place. Modify surface data by calling [method clear], followed by [method add_surface] for each surface.

method.name: add_blend_shape
method.description: Adds name for a blend shape that will be added with [method add_surface]. Must be called before surface is added.

method.name: add_surface
method.description: Creates a new surface, analogous to [method ArrayMesh.add_surface_from_arrays]. Surfaces are created to be rendered using a [code]primitive[/code], which may be any of the types defined in [enum Mesh.PrimitiveType]. (As a note, when using indices, it is recommended to only use points, lines, or triangles.) [method Mesh.get_surface_count] will become the [code]surf_idx[/code] for this new surface. The [code]arrays[/code] argument is an array of arrays. See [enum Mesh.ArrayType] for the values used in this array. For example, [code]arrays[0][/code] is the array of vertices. That first vertex sub-array is always required; the others are optional. Adding an index array puts this function into "index mode" where the vertex and other arrays become the sources of data and the index array defines the vertex order. All sub-arrays must have the same length as the vertex array or be empty, except for [constant Mesh.ARRAY_INDEX] if it is used.

method.name: clear
method.description: Removes all surfaces and blend shapes from this [ImporterMesh].

method.name: get_blend_shape_count
method.description: Returns the number of blend shapes that the mesh holds.

method.name: get_blend_shape_mode
method.description: Returns the blend shape mode for this Mesh.

method.name: get_blend_shape_name
method.description: Returns the name of the blend shape at this index.

method.name: get_lightmap_size_hint
method.description: Returns the size hint of this mesh for lightmap-unwrapping in UV-space.

method.name: get_mesh
method.description: Returns the mesh data represented by this [ImporterMesh] as a usable [ArrayMesh]. This method caches the returned mesh, and subsequent calls will return the cached data until [method clear] is called. If not yet cached and [code]base_mesh[/code] is provided, [code]base_mesh[/code] will be used and mutated.

method.name: get_surface_arrays
method.description: Returns the arrays for the vertices, normals, uvs, etc. that make up the requested surface. See [method add_surface].

method.name: get_surface_blend_shape_arrays
method.description: Returns a single set of blend shape arrays for the requested blend shape index for a surface.

method.name: get_surface_count
method.description: Returns the amount of surfaces that the mesh holds.

method.name: get_surface_format
method.description: Returns the format of the surface that the mesh holds.

method.name: get_surface_lod_count
method.description: Returns the amount of lods that the mesh holds on a given surface.

method.name: get_surface_lod_indices
method.description: Returns the index buffer of a lod for a surface.

method.name: get_surface_lod_size
method.description: Returns the screen ratio which activates a lod for a surface.

method.name: get_surface_material
method.description: Returns a [Material] in a given surface. Surface is rendered using this material.

method.name: get_surface_name
method.description: Gets the name assigned to this surface.

method.name: get_surface_primitive_type
method.description: Returns the primitive type of the requested surface (see [method add_surface]).

method.name: set_blend_shape_mode
method.description: Sets the blend shape mode to one of [enum Mesh.BlendShapeMode].

method.name: set_lightmap_size_hint
method.description: Sets the size hint of this mesh for lightmap-unwrapping in UV-space.

method.name: set_surface_material
method.description: Sets a [Material] for a given surface. Surface will be rendered using this material.

method.name: set_surface_name
method.description: Sets a name for a given surface.
